channel.title: New comment feature on Soundcloud mobile
channel.description: Soundcloud mobile finally has a commenting system on tracks, which is awesome as it was really needed. ![image|281x500](upload://ree0ITZtpG7Bmv4duWF9KKQOFQb.jpeg) Itâ€™s just as good as commenting on a laptop/pc as you comment like normal at a certain point and you can see other comments. Just thought Iâ€™d tell you guys in case you havenâ€™t seen it yet ðŸ™‚
